DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , subject-masked , bilateral , daily wear , two-month dispensing study
DOC.brief_title: Performance Fanfilcon A Toric Lenses After Least One Month Wearing Enfilcon A Toric Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine adapt contact lens wearer enfilcon A toric lens confidently refit fanfilcon A toric lens successful one month daily wear .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported eye exam last two year Is habitual soft toric lens wearer Can successfully fit study lens ( â‰¥ grade 2 fit acceptance ) Has contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 6.00D cylinder 0.75 1.75D ( Diopters ) ( inclusive ) Has spectacle cylinder least 0.75D eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle refraction distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter Has contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) Is willing comply visit schedule . A person exclude study he/she : Has history achieve comfortable CL ( Contact Lens ) wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Presents clinically significant anterior segment abnormality Presents ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear Presents slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Significant pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Anterior uveitis iritis ( history past year ) Seborrheic eczema eyelid region , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study . Is frequently use rewetting/ lubricate eye drop ( per day )
